analysis.description:
CryptoCasherCrowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/17/0xc13fb9a99e36d9511c6c678023160959555ed194.sol#147-171) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-tokenContract.mint(_investor,tokens,owner) (/unique_chucks/17/0xc13fb9a99e36d9511c6c678023160959555ed194.sol#156)
	-tokenContract.mint(addressFundNonKYCReserv,tokens,owner) (/unique_chucks/17/0xc13fb9a99e36d9511c6c678023160959555ed194.sol#157-159)

CryptoCasherCrowdsale.checkReferalLink (/unique_chucks/17/0xc13fb9a99e36d9511c6c678023160959555ed194.sol#216-231) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-tokenContract.mint(referer,_refererTokens,addressFundBlchainReferal) (/unique_chucks/17/0xc13fb9a99e36d9511c6c678023160959555ed194.sol#226-227)
	-tokenContract.mint(msg.sender,_refererTokens,addressFundBlchainReferal) (/unique_chucks/17/0xc13fb9a99e36d9511c6c678023160959555ed194.sol#228-230)

CryptoCasherCrowdsale.claimTokens (/unique_chucks/17/0xc13fb9a99e36d9511c6c678023160959555ed194.sol#301-310) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-tokenContract.transfer(owner,balance) (/unique_chucks/17/0xc13fb9a99e36d9511c6c678023160959555ed194.sol#309-310)

CryptoCasherCrowdsale.batchTransferPaidTokens (/unique_chucks/17/0xc13fb9a99e36d9511c6c678023160959555ed194.sol#313-334) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-paidTokens[_recipients[j]].sub(_values[j]) (/unique_chucks/17/0xc13fb9a99e36d9511c6c678023160959555ed194.sol#327-328)
	-tokenContract.transferFrom(addressFundNonKYCReserv,_recipients[j],_values[j]) (/unique_chucks/17/0xc13fb9a99e36d9511c6c678023160959555ed194.sol#328-331)

CryptoCasherCrowdsale.batchTransferPaidTokens has external calls inside a loop:
	- tokenContract.transferFrom(addressFundNonKYCReserv,_recipients[j],_values[j]) (/unique_chucks/17/0xc13fb9a99e36d9511c6c678023160959555ed194.sol#328-331)

Reentrancy in CryptoCasherCrowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/17/0xc13fb9a99e36d9511c6c678023160959555ed194.sol#147-171):
	External calls:
	- tokenContract.mint(addressFundNonKYCReserv,tokens,owner) (/unique_chucks/17/0xc13fb9a99e36d9511c6c678023160959555ed194.sol#157-159)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- paidTokens (/unique_chucks/17/0xc13fb9a99e36d9511c6c678023160959555ed194.sol#159-160)

Reentrancy in CryptoCasherCrowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/17/0xc13fb9a99e36d9511c6c678023160959555ed194.sol#147-171):
	External calls:
	- tokenContract.mint(_investor,tokens,owner) (/unique_chucks/17/0xc13fb9a99e36d9511c6c678023160959555ed194.sol#156)
	- tokenContract.mint(addressFundNonKYCReserv,tokens,owner) (/unique_chucks/17/0xc13fb9a99e36d9511c6c678023160959555ed194.sol#157-159)

	- deposited (/unique_chucks/17/0xc13fb9a99e36d9511c6c678023160959555ed194.sol#169)
